snippet.title: EVERSLAUGHT Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1530750?utm_source=yt&utm_campaign=static&utm_medium=video&utm_content=ealaunchtrailer

Traverse an ancient city with randomly generated dungeons, discover rare loot, upgrade your gear, level up your skills and engage in visceral combat with completely unrestricted VR movement and combat.

Join our Community Discord:
discord.gg/everslaught

Video channel:
youtube.com/channel/UCKrMJR3oF2kTOTUSsy5iSYA

Created and published by MobX Games

Sound & Music by Martin Gleitze:
https://soundcloud.com/martingleitzespricht
